description_for_human: Create a code interpreter for js with an example in code sandbox.
description_for_model: This plugin enables the creation of sandboxes on CodeSandbox directly from a Next.js application. It provides an API endpoint that accepts a file structure and dependencies in JSON format, then makes a POST request to the CodeSandbox API to create a new sandbox with those files and dependencies. Finally, the plugin returns a link to the newly created sandbox. This can be useful for developers who want to generate live code examples on CodeSandbox directly from their own applications or websites.
